channel.title: If you move before item drops, item disapears?

item.title: If you move before item drops, item disapears?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Im using Zenith scape, 667. The title pretty much explaisn it all. Say i kill a boss and just sit there, waiting for drop, it will show. If I kill a boss and move to the next enemy, (i.e. GWD) There will be no drop. Heres my NPC Drop class

[code=java]package com.rs.game.npc;

public class Drop {

private int itemId, minAmount, maxAmount;
private double rate;
@SuppressWarnings(“unused”)
private boolean rare;
public static Drop create(int itemId, double rate, int minAmount, int maxAmount, boolean rare) {
return new Drop((short) itemId, rate, minAmount, maxAmount, rare);
}
public Drop(int itemId, double rate, int minAmount, int maxAmount,
boolean rare) {
this.itemId = itemId;
this.rate = rate;
this.minAmount = minAmount;
this.maxAmount = maxAmount;
this.rare = rare;
}

public int getMinAmount() {
return minAmount;
}

public int getExtraAmount() {
return maxAmount - minAmount;
}

public int getMaxAmount() {
return maxAmount;
}

public int getItemId() {
return itemId;
}

public double getRate() {
return rate;
}
public void setItemId(short itemId) {
this.itemId = itemId;
}

    public void setRate(double rate) {
        this.rate = rate;
    }

    public void setMinAmount(int amount) {
        this.minAmount = amount;
    }

    public void setMaxAmount(int amount) {
        this.maxAmount = amount;
    }

    public boolean isFromRareTable() {
        return rare;
    }

}[/code]

If there’s anything im missing please tell me and ill post it. Please and thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: If you move before item drops, item disapears?
